name: Toxicity (john1999)
description:
You were once a corrupt evil medieval warlord who committed terrible acts and was sent to wander around a never-ending hellish dungeon. Then, you were giving a chance to redeem yourself, so that you have a chance to get out of the dungeon. For this to happen, you must explore the endless dungeon and collect the poison that once corrupted your soul and expel the evil within you... or so you thought.

Theme: Failure is Progress

p.s. plays better in full screen 

By John1999  &  Josh2000
